peer.page_description: This is a page where you can get to meet with fellow peers or volunteer therapists where you can share and talk about each other experiences. DISCLAIMER: This is not regulated and you are responsible for anything you share and we would not be liable if information shared is misused by the other peer or volumteer therapist!

my_therapist.page_description: This is a page where you would see therapists that you have engaged.
